scripts.start: chmod +x /usr/local/lib/node_modules && npm i pm2 -g && node index.js
scripts.amd64_pm2start: chmod +x ./amd64/hbbs && chmod +x ./amd64/hbbr && pm2 start ./amd64/hbbs -- -r 0.0.0.0 && pm2 start ./amd64/hbbr
scripts.pm2start: chmod +x ./i386/hbbs && chmod +x ./i386/hbbr && pm2 start ./i386/hbbs -- -r 0.0.0.0 && pm2 start ./i386/hbbr
scripts.arm_pm2start: chmod +x ./armv7/hbbs && chmod +x ./armv7/hbbr && pm2 start ./armv7/hbbs -- -r 0.0.0.0 && pm2 start ./armv7/hbbr
scripts.arm64_pm2start: chmod +x ./arm64v8/hbbs && chmod +x ./arm64v8/hbbr && pm2 start ./arm64v8/hbbs -- -r 0.0.0.0 && pm2 start ./arm64v8/hbbr
